title: kAshI vishAlAkSIm
sahitya:
kAshI vishAlAkSIm bhajEham bhajE shrI


anupallavi

 kAshI vishvEshvara manOllAsa kAriNIm karuNArasa laharIm guruguha vishvAsinIm


caraNam   kAshIpura vAsinIm kAmita phaladAyinIm kali kalmaSa nAshinIm gandharva ghOSita gamakakriyA 
mOdinIm pAsha mOcanIm kapAla shUlinIm pannaga vENIm dAsajana mukundavara pradAyinIm
